name: Mario Bomberman: Ice Mountains
description:
Everyone know bomberman, right?

You control Mario the Bomberman, your goal is to  become the last survivor of the Ice Mountains. You must use bombs in order to eliminate your opponents.

You can find more bombs when you explode the snowmen, speed boosts and range boosts.

Use them to win!

We are a French team students and we are proud to deliver you this game made in one month.

Please share with us your feelings and your feedbacks!
